system.description: Effect: The user is cured of a Status Condition and the target is given that Status Condition. If the target cannot receive that Status Condition, the user is only cured of the Status Condition when using this Attack.

actions.name: Psycho Shift
actions.description: Effect: The user is cured of a Status Condition and the target is given that Status Condition. If the target cannot receive that Status Condition, the user is only cured of the Status Condition when using this Attack.
